citation.article-title: Proposal of Parvimonas gen. nov. and Quatrionicoccus gen. nov. as replacements for the illegitimate, prokaryotic, generic names Micromonas Murdoch and Shah 2000 and Quadricoccus Maszenan et al. 2002, respectively.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Parvimonas micra (Prévot 1933) Tindall and Euzéby comb. nov.
Parvimonas micra (mi′cra. Gr. adj. mikros -ê -on small, little; N.L. fem. adj. micra small, little).
Basonym: Peptostreptococcus micros (sic) (Prévot 1933) Smith 1957 (Approved Lists 1980); illegitimate homotypic synonym: Micromonas micros (sic) (Prévot 1933) Murdoch and Shah 2000.
The description of the species is as given for Micromonas micros (sic) in Murdoch & Shah (1999).
